website_summaries.verdict: This is a neat gift idea for Trolls fans of different ages, but Pillow Pets enthusiasts may be surprised to find it smaller than anticipated.
pros: Provides both a stuffed toy and soft spot for kids to lounge
Plushy Troll head opens to a large pillow
cons: Consumers who have owned other Pillow Pets gripe that this one is much smaller than others made by the brand

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured, soft but more for temporary use.
customer_reviews.text: Is soft and looks exactly like pictured but not super comfortable lol. This is my first pillow pet so maybe they are all that way. I got it to put in my sons bed w him but it’s not comfortable enough for everyday use. I would say perfect for more of a sleepover or in the car or even as a stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought. Looks just like the picture. Overall a good gift for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Trolls is his favorite movie and this pillow pet was perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pillow for our 4 year old for Xmas and he loves it! Trolls is his favorite movie and this pillow pet was perfect for him. The price is on point for the product and it is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Duvak

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift for a great grandson and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for a great grandson and he loves it. The hair is soft and you just cannot stop yourself from rubbing it and the smile is contageous!

customer_reviews.title: Cute, a little smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, well made, but smaller than original pillow pets. My 5 year old likes it a lot. I did not bother reading dimensions, so I was a little surprised by the size.
customer_reviews.author: Mustard Seed Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was a little smaller than I expected. Other than that it’s great quality and my son loves trolls so I know my son will love it! Can’t wait to give it to him for Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: not too large a perfect size for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves the branch pillow pet, not too large a perfect size for a 3 year old!

product_meta.title: Pillow Pets DreamWorks Trolls Branch 16" Stuffed Animal Plush Toy
product_meta.description: Welcome to Troll Town! Introducing Branch, voiced by Justin Timberlake in the DreamWorks animated movie Trolls. The adorable overly practical Troll with loads of attitude learning to embrace his true colors to find inner happiness with the help of Poppy at his side. You Can’t Stop the Feeling for this huggable Trolls Pillow Pets - Branch Stuffed Animal Plush Toy, whether it’s styling Branch’s mop-of-blue hair for daytime play, or transforming him into a comfy pillow for a restful night’s sleep. A super-soft chenille plush folding stuffed animal toy, so cuddly you’ll never want to put it down! An ideal naptime companion – not to mention a comforting partner on road trips or airplane rides – Pillow Pets are anything but just another toddler pillow. The Pillow Pet Branch starts out as your pal, then un-velcro its belly, and it magically becomes your pillow! A bedtime solution that will have your kids running to their room with their new pet for a good night’s rest on their new favorite pillow. Made of high-quality washable chenille. BPA and phthalates free. Opens to a 16-inch pillow. As with all decorative pillows, not recommended for children under the age of 3.
feature_bullets: WELCOME TO TROLL TOWN: Your favorite pessimistic troll is now a Pillow Pet! Although not as cheerful as the other trolls, you’ll find that he makes great companion to adventure with because he’s practical and always prepared.

COMFORTING COMPANION: Pillow Pets presents super soft, cute, & adorable stuffed animals that unfold into fuzzy pillows for sleep. Kids, teens, & adults love these classic & collectible comfy critters.
COMFORT: This plush is a pal by day, then unfasten its belly to make a pillow by night! Comfortable travel friend for any child on road trips & airplanes. Also use as boy & girl bedroom decoration.
BEST BUDDY: Children of all ages will love this original toy for play & as a large pillow for reading, watching television, studying, and sleepy nap time. Youth love to read with this cozy creature.

SPECS: Official Pillow Pets & licensed DreamWorks item. High-quality chenille. BPA & Phthalates free. Unfastens to 16-in pillow. To wash, put in white pillow case & tie open end. Cold water. Gentle cycle.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars87 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
